headline: Mars buys Kellanova, Goldman Sachs makes bullish hotel calls
summary: Market Domination host Josh Lipton outlines the stories driving interest in some of Monday's trending tickers, including Mars Snacking's acquisition of Kellanova (K); Bank of America's upgrade of Bristol Myers (BMY); and Goldman Sachs's bullish calls on Marriott (MAR), Hilton (HLT), and Las Vegas Sands (LVS). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
